text: Great🧵by @CT_Bergstrom re safe/sustained #schoolsreopening. Takeaways: more likely in ES (vs MS/HS due to no class changing etc), if teacher #vaccine ✅, if #MaskUp & #distancing ✅, if community control of #COVID19 ✅, if surveillance testing ✅. #B117 🇬🇧 will make much harder. https://t.co/9iDeWUhsFE
